Key Match Events: The Dallas Mavericks broke a five-game losing streak
LeBron James nearly had a triple-double with 18 points, 10 rebounds, and 8 assists
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed disappointment about the Lakers' exit from a two-game road trip without a win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas shot a blistering 18/38 from three-point range
The Mavericks' win pushed them back ahead of the Lakers in the Western Conference standings
Others: JJ Redick revealed one key reason for the Mavericks' win over the Lakers
The Mavericks were playing without Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving
